description: Delkin's Universal Reader-41 is a high speed USB 2.0 multi-card reader/writer. It is ideal for transferring data from digital cameras, handheld PC's, and MP3 players. Works with memory cards from the most popular camera manufacturers, and many more: Canon - Fuji - Kodak - Konica Minolta - Nikon - Olympus- Panasonic – Sony. It supports all memory card formats including CF, SD, microSD, xD, Memory Stick, Smart Media, Reduced Size MMC 4.0 (MMC Mobile), SDXC, SDHC and UDMA-enabled CompactFlash! The Reader-41 features dynamic hot-swappable card slots and plug and play. Compatible with Microsoft Windows 98 / 98SE / ME / 2000 / XP /Mac OS 9 and X. FCC & CE approved.
title: Delkin All-In-One Universal Card Reader Compatible with SDXC, UDMA and SDHC DDREADER-41
